title: Voice of Machine
description: Expanding on Queen in Exile, Malikah and her Father confront the duplicity of the Tlillan/Human condition as both good and evil do battle.More than one terrible battle ensues as enemies come forth to test Xch’uups’ mettle. Tears are shed and blood is spilt from Otoch to the Galactic core as religious law, millennia old, is torn down.
author: Oliver  Strong
